comment: по клику на когитатор Паскаль баркает и кланяется

languages.text: "Паттерн сего когитатора столь стар и сакрален, что мне не доводилось видеть подобных прежде, лишь слышать обрывки легенд о них".
"This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I have only heard about them from fragments of legend."
languages.original_text: "Паттерн сего когитатора столь стар и сакрален, что мне не доводилось видеть подобных прежде, лишь слышать обрывки легенд о них".

traits.locale_text: "This cogitator's pattern is so old and so sacred that I have never seen one like this before, only heard about them in fragmentary legends."
"This cogitator's pattern is so old and so sacred that I have never seen one like this before, only heard about them in fragmentary legends."
"This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I've only heard about them from fragments of legend."
"This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I've only heard about them from fragments of legend."
"This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I have only heard about them from fragments of legend."
"This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I have only heard about them from fragments of legend."

languages.text: 「この考算機のパターンは私の知る限り最も古く神聖なものです。伝説の端々でしか耳にしたことがありませんでした」
languages.original_text: "This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I have only heard about them from fragments of legend."

traits.locale_text: 「この考算機のパターンは私の知る限り最も古く神聖なものです。伝説の端々でしか耳にしたことがありませんでした」

languages.text: “这个沉思者的模式如此古老，如此神圣。我之前从未见过类似的东西，只从某些零碎的传说中听说过它们。”
languages.original_text: "This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I have only heard about them from fragments of legend."

traits.locale_text: “这个思考器的模式如此古老，如此神圣。我之前从未见过类似的东西，只从某些零碎的传说中听说过它们。”

languages.text: « C'est la première fois que je vois ce modèle de cogitateur. Il est tellement ancien et sacré que c'en était presque devenu une légende. »
languages.original_text: "This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I have only heard about them from fragments of legend."

traits.locale_text: « C'est la première fois que je vois ce modèle de cogitateur. Il est tellement ancien et sacré que c'en était presque devenu une légende. »

languages.text: «Nunca antes había visto un patrón de cogitador tan antiguo y sagrado, solo lo había escuchado en leyendas».
languages.original_text: "This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I have only heard about them from fragments of legend."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca antes había visto un patrón de cogitador tan antiguo y sagrado, solo lo había escuchado en leyendas».

languages.text: "Das Muster dieses Cogitators ist so alt und heilig, ich habe etwas Derartiges noch nie gesehen. Ich habe nur in Fragmenten von Legenden davon gehört."
languages.original_text: "This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I have only heard about them from fragments of legend."

traits.locale_text: "Das Muster dieses Cogitators ist so alt und heilig, ich habe etwas Derartiges noch nie gesehen. Ich habe nur in Fragmenten von Legenden davon gehört."

languages.text: "Bu kavramsayarın modeli o kadar eski ve kutsal ki daha önce böyle bir şey hiç görmemiştim. Bunları bir tek efsanelerde duymuştum."
languages.original_text: "This cogitator's pattern is so old and sacred I have never seen the like of it before. I have only heard about them from fragments of legend."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kavramsayarın modeli o kadar eski ve kutsal ki daha önce böyle bir şey hiç görmemiştim. Bunları yalnızca efsanelerdeki detaylarda dinlemiştim."
